feed.title: Eliminating double-spends with two-party self-escrow for high value transactions

entry.title: Eliminating double-spends with two-party self-escrow for high value transactions
entry.summary: The proposed mechanism for a single payment is similar to Jeremy Spilman's micropayment channel. However, the concern is whether wallet UIs can handle it without being too complicated for users. This could cause users to switch to a more user-friendly option. Despite this potential issue, there may be a way to present it in a slick and intuitive manner.
